item.title: Star Racer launches July 28
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/star-racer-launches-july-28

  • PC

Currently in Early Access.

Retro-inspired combat racer Star Racer will leave Early Access and launch for PC via Steam on July 28, developer Whatnot Games announced.

Star Racer first launched in Early Access on March 8.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Buckle up and reach for the stars! Star Racer is a high-octane combat racer that invokes the thrill of retro classics. Blaze through the streets and defy gravity with gripping aerial assaults in order to be the first—or only—racer to cross the finish line.

Engage in electrifying battles on the intergalactic racetrack where every turn is a chance to outsmart the opposition! Crossing the finish line will take strategy, skill, and a whole lot of guts. Balance your energy between boost and health, and carve an opportune path through the competition. Clean driving isn’t enough to claim victory. Smash through your rivals with circling ground attacks, or eliminate the competition in the stars with all-out aerial assaults!

Your rivals won’t be the only threat on the track, as you must navigate the perilous hazards that can take you out in the blink of an eye. Drive through icy patches, sizzling lava pits, and bouncy roads that can throw any seasoned racer off their game. Danger takes the form of weaponry as well. Avoid enemy turrets targeting your every move, and drift through bombastic mines awaiting the slightest touch. One wrong move and you’ll be left in the stardust.

Star Racer features a comprehensive track editor allowing you to challenge yourself or friends with custom circuits. Manipulate every single aspect of a track in order to create dynamic circuits from scratch. Craft the height and width of the roads, as well as the angles of nail-biting turns. Once the foundation is set, explore the hazards library and spill a bit of danger onto the concrete. The only limitation is your imagination.

Key Features

  • Heart-Pounding Races – Engage in intense battles across the intergalactic racetrack. Use cunning strategies as you drift, boost, fire, and soar your place to the front of the pack!
  • Concrete and Clouds – Dust the competition through the pavement and the skies! Bring high octane races to new heights with gravity-defying glides and aerial combat. Blaze across the pavement, soar through the stars, and leave your rivals in the stardust.
  • Track Editor – Unleash your creativity with our dynamic track editor. Craft your own challenging circuits, share them with friends, and conquer the most daring designs. The race is in your hands!
  • Perilous Hazards – Watch out for treacherous hazards! Navigate through sizzling lava pits and slippery ice patches that add an extra layer of challenge to every race. Only the most skilled racers will conquer the cosmic obstacles!
  • Local Multiplayer – Grab up to three friends and dive into the multiplayer mayhem! Star Racer supports up to four players in local multiplayer, ensuring the party never stops. It’s time to see who among your crew is the true cosmic speedster!
  • Unique Cars – Choose from a lineup of distinct, rad vehicles. Each car comes with its own set of strengths and weaknesses, adding a strategic layer to the race. Find your perfect match and dominate the competition!
  • Featured Tracks by Grant Kirkhope – Immerse yourself in the pulsating beats of Star Racer with featured tracks by the legendary Grant Kirkhope. The musical genius behind Banjo-Kazooie, GoldenEye 007, and Mario & Rabbids contributes his signature style to select tracks.

item.title: ‘Momentum-fueled’ roguelite first-person shooter Gunstoppable announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/momentum-fueled-roguelite-first-person-shooter-gunstoppable-announced-for-pc

  • PC

Dual-wield devastating weapon combos.

CAGE Studios has announced “momentum-fueled” roguelite first-person shooter Gunstoppable for PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Dual-wield devastating weapon combos in this momentum-fueled roguelite first-person shooter. Chain movement, stack every upgrade, and bend time to overpower the odds in style!

Key Features

  • Dual-Wield Destruction – Dual-wield devastating weapon combos and surge with momentum in a roguelite first-person shooter where every upgrade stacks and time itself becomes your weapon.
  • Move Like a Missile – Dodge a constant barrage of enemy projectiles with deft movement and timed parries. Chain grapples, slides, wallruns, and railgrinds to build momentum, then unleash firepower while in motion for furious damage. Move fast, hit hard, and survive in style.
  • Reaper Mode Execution – Rack up kills to activate Reaper Mode—pause time, wreak havoc, then unpause reality to shatter clusters of foes in a single moment.
  • Craft Overpowered Builds – Slot attachments into weapons on a hex grid where placement matters. Turn shotguns into flamethrowers or bananas into nukes. Rearrange anytime to maximize elemental effects, discover wild synergies, and completely change how you fight mid-run.
  • Die with Purpose – Each run is a new configuration of chaos—new weapon combos, new enemy encounters, and new ways to break the game. Every death builds upon the last, earning permanent upgrades at the end of each run.
  • Rewrite a Broken Future – Destroy the architects of endless brutality in a blood-curdling odyssey through underground prisons, cyberpunk cityscapes, and into the great beyond to settle the score. Turn the tables on the wealthy warlords who made you into a killing machine.
